name: Dacia Driving Simulator
description:
Ever wanted to drive a 2014 Romanian car using only your computer?
Are you bored of racing games with fast cars and perfect physics?
Do you like playing car sandbox games with friends?    If you've replied yes to any of these questions, then Dacia Driving Simulator is for you!

In this game you'll be able to drive a car based on 2014 Dacia Logan MCV. Unlike many other car games, which often focus on fast sport cars, here you'll be able to enjoy a true wagon, whose purpose was not to race, but to carry a lot of stuff and be cheap. BUT, who said you have to use the car according to it's purpose? This game lets you experience driving in a car, with an almighty 90HP engine, and a max speed of 162km/h (allegedly). 

What makes this game better than many other crap games?

The main feature of this game is multiplayer!
That's right! You can play this game with friends, and drive your Dacias together! You can race, play carball or just mess around! Anything can be fun with friends!

Aside from that, this game also supports custom textures. But what does it mean?
Well, basically, if you can use any graphical program and a notepad, you can easily make your own texture pack, and use it in multiplayer with your friends!

What is planned for the future?

I plan to not improve stuff currently in the game, but also add something new, for example new gamemodes or maps.

 

But why? Why even make a game about a car like this?

The answer to that is simple - I have a Dacia car, and I wanted to make a game with my car. Besides, not many other games feature cars of this class, ain't I right?

 

So... what are you waiting for?
Download the game and check it out!
